title: SAP: Synch business partners to SharePoint folder using OData
description: This workflow template triggers on a recurring schedule and extracts business partners from SAP ERP or S/4HANA Cloud. The workflow supports processing downstream SAP master data in Microsoft 365 and uses the publicly available SAP [S/4HANA public cloud sandbox](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2282241), and produces JSON. When you use this template, use the URL and authentication scheme for your own SAP system. For more information, see [Get started with SAP and Microsoft integration scenarios](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2282033).
